Question: Guthrie had been a revelation to this person and was the biggest influence on his early performances.
Hints: In June 1986, this person married his longtime backup singer Carolyn Dennis (often professionally known as Carol Dennis).
The surreal, humorous this person reemerged on "I Shall Be Free No. 10" and "Motorpsycho Nightmare".
This was the first time this person had sanctioned a re-mix of one of his classic recordings.
